author: Author
alert_right_answer_1:
Great! You completed the task at the first go.
Your answer '###L###' is right.
alert_right_answer_3: Although you seem to have guessed, your answer '###L###' is right.
task_get_near: Nähern Sie sich der Aufgabe, um die Aufgabenstellung sehen zu können.
private_route_added: Route with title '###T###' was successfully added.
main_map_traffic: An active internet connection is required for the use of the online map. This function can cause a high data usage.
toast_no_routes: No routes were found. Update the data at the main menu.
toast_no_routes_near_you: No routes were found near you.
private_route_failed: There was no match for the given code. Maybe you need to update the app.
toast_need_internet_for_update: To update the data an internet connection is required.
guided_trail: Do you want to start from a certain task?
about_mcm:
MathCityMap is a project of the working group MATIS I (IDMI, Goethe-University Frankfurt Main).
 MCM consists of an app and a web portal. After a short registration the MathCityMap web portal (www.mathcitymap.eu) offers users the possibility to create own tasks and trails, which later on can be accessed from the app. Furthermore trails can be downloaded as a PDF-file from the web portal. All MathCityMap tools are free. 

 Responsible persons:
 Matthias Ludwig
 Iwan Gurjanow
 Joerg Zender

  MathCityMap uses images of https://icons8.com:
 https://icons8.com/web-app/5682/marker
 https://icons8.com/web-app/2969/settings-filled
 https://icons8.com/web-app/13114/cancel
 https://icons8.com/web-app/5575/plus
 https://icons8.com/web-app/16570/exit
 https://icons8.com/web-app/5663/worldwide-location
 https://icons8.com/web-app/5594/key 
 https://icons8.com/web-app/6269/waypoint-map
 https://icons8.com/web-app/13115/ok
